DataElement.preferredDefinition: A textual description of a person's risk behavior activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable._human or animal activity studied in terms of motivation, direction, result, emotion, perception, or etiology._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable.:human or animal activity studied in terms of motivation, direction, result, emotion, perception, or etiology.:An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Concepts.definition: The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable.
The actions or reactions of an object or organism, usually in relation to the environment or surrounding world of stimuli.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable._Human or animal activity studied in terms of motivation, direction, result, emotion, perception, or etiology._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A directive to indicate a response not listed.

Concepts.definition: A directive to indicate a response not listed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Inhaling the vapor produced by an electronic cigarette or similar device.

Concepts.definition: Inhaling the vapor produced by an electronic cigarette or similar device.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who was not smoking at the time of the interview but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their life.

Concepts.definition: A person who has quit smoking at the time of the interview but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their life.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An adult who has smoked 100 cigarettes in his or her lifetime and who currently smokes cigarettes. Includes daily smokers and non-daily smokers (also known as occasional smokers).

Concepts.definition: An adult who has smoked 100 cigarettes in his or her lifetime and who currently smokes cigarettes. Includes daily smokers and non-daily smokers (also known as occasional smokers).

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added OBIB alternate name and identifier DW 03-21-2019

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A description of an individual's current and past experience with alcoholic beverage consumption.

Concepts.definition: A description of an individual's current and past experience with alcoholic beverage consumption.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.: An indication or description regarding an episode of substance usage.: Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.: Maladaptive pattern of drug or alcohol use that may lead to social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
An indication or description regarding an episode of substance usage.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
Maladaptive pattern of drug or alcohol use that may lead to social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems.
